Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

This is 100% stock, if you don't have Kerbbaint, it will just be white&grey.

The girls are testing a new home for the four kerbals from a famous rock band. It's fully functional except it can't dive. It's got a cupboard (or was it a toilet? Can't remember), 4 bunks, 2 fuel cell arrays, a periscope with a funny looking head and a control panel with strange lights. Steering is done with changing the max output of left or right engines at the rear. It also has a ladder to the lower level, although you might not want to go there, there might be blue meanies.

Action groups:

1: Toggle engines

2: Toggle periscope

3: Open/close top hatch

4: Start fuel cell array

5: Toggle reversing engines

Top speed: 7.5m/s. Go faster and a rear engine goes kaput.

I haven't tested this with Better Buoyancy.

Suggested mods:

Kerbpaint for the color

Hyperedit for transporting it into water

Take Command for filling the chairs

Download link:http://kerbalx.com/crafts/4808

..A German U-Boat?

Just kidding, of course I get the reference. Yellow Submarine! Yellow Submarine!

Love those tiny details! You're one for aesthetics Really, well done!

... A yellow ship?

Cause it ain't no submarine.

... Golden floating green-bean?

I like it, interesting interior.
It's a sub once Squad gives use proper densities for stuff and water.

It's a sub once Squad gives use proper densities for stuff and water.

Have they said it will come because that would be awesome!

We could ask for it for 1.2

Or ... a right click context menu in the editor, for adjusting buoyancy/density/material type <-- that's what I would want, I already have a mod with different materials, and I'd like the concept to get the attention of the large community/devs one day.

It's not like we build everything out of heavy steel bars, beams, sheets and panels in real life.

I hate to admit it... But you've outdone my Typhoon. The submarine revolution has begun!

Time to start working on an even bigger, even faster, even cooler sub!

I know, an Alfa class!!

Edited August 28, 2015 by pTrevTrevs
Thank you all! Yes, I'd love to have a sub technology race.
